name: Into The Mines (Hugison) (Hugison)
description:
You have to go deeper into the mines as fast as possible without crashing your Minecart. Gravity is your only friend to gain speed. You can just slow down and rotate the Cart. “Glück auf!” or “Best of luck!”

You can play in browser or download the game.

Bugs:

- Online leaderboards only work in downloaded version

Changes to Jam Version:

- Added main menu and tutorial
- Changed UI ingame
- Added leaderboards (only top 7 will be displayed)
- Added more sounds
- Changed level at some points

Hint:
Returning to main menu will reset checkpoints and timer.
